name: basic-informational-site
description: Make a project directory and create the following files inside that directory: index.html about.html contact-me.html 404.html Create your node.js server file index.js and add the code needed to serve the right page according to the url. localhost:8080 should take users to index.html localhost:8080/about should take users to about.html localhost:8080/contact-me should take users to contact-me.html 404.html should display any time the user tries to go to a page not listed above.
